text: The 2007–08 Arizona State Sun Devils men's basketball team represented Arizona State University during the 2007–08 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Sun Devils played their home games at the Wells Fargo Arena and were members of the Pacific-10 Conference. The Sun Devils finished with 21–13, 9–9 in Pac-10 play. They were invited to play in the 2008 National Invitation Tournament where they beat and . They subsequently lost in the quarter finals to Florida.
